text: Hi! I figured out how to use the `/properties` API but I'm trying to find a way to grab only the ones used in the form to specify a Contact (I customized it). Is this possible? I noticed the HubSpot fronted uses graphQL to fetch those

Hello guys,

Do you know if there is a way to listen click event on the live chat icon?

I couldn't find anything here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversation/chat-widget-sdk>

Thanks in advance.
